Name: City Gangs War in Miami
About the game: Join City Gangs Miami in 30 action well packed missions in his never-ending quest to defeat The BigBoss. City Gangs Miami is a third person shooter where you have to eliminate all opponents, use grenades, rifles, rocket launchers, tanks, helicopter to defeat the enemy. FEATURES - 30 missions - Controllable vehicles, like cars,tanks, helicopters, air fighters and turrets! - Multiple weapons - Extra Explosives - Achievements - lots of enemies to defeat - A shop with awesome ingame features like GodMode, Golden Gun and a Jetpack!!
